reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: Reference establishing shot of location 'throne_room': A vast, oppressive medieval throne room at deep night. The architecture features high vaulted ceilings supported by massive stone pillars draped with heavy, richly colored tapestries (now being slashed). The floor is polished dark marble reflecting the flickering light of numerous braziers and wall sconces, which cast long, dramatic, high-contrast shadows across the scene. The atmosphere is one of sudden, brutal chaos—overturned heavy wooden furniture (thrones, tables) made of dark oak and gilded metal litter the floor. The air feels thick with dust and violence. Weather is irrelevant as the scene is entirely indoors, but the lighting suggests stormy nighttime conditions outside, though we don't see it.

The scene is dominated by cold, blue-grey moonlight mixing with the light of dying torch fire, creating very sharp chiaroscuro contrast. The low-angle perspective is established, looking toward the closed doorway which dominates the central background. No figures are visible yet near the door or in the foreground. The environment, lighting, and atmosphere must exactly replicate the setting from Image 0, but modified to show the massive throne room doors of dark, thick wood banded with iron dominating the central background and closed. The lighting must be cold, blue-grey moonlight mixing with the light of dying torch fire, creating very sharp chiaroscuro contrast, as described in the frame, maintaining the photorealistic medieval fantasy style directive for texture and fidelity.

Visual Style: Photorealistic medieval fantasy, HBO prestige television quality, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses. Real human actors in practical costumes — genuine leather, real chainmail, wool, silk, mud, rust, sweat. Natural skin with pores, imperfections, scars, freckles, and weathering. Real weather — mist, firelight, torchlight, dawn light. Warm golden palette for the peaceful kingdom, cold blue-grey for the coup and escape, rich dark crimson-and-black for the Witch's scenes, warm earthy tones for the village, luminous golden light for magic scenes. Deep chiaroscuro shadows, shallow depth of field with creamy anamorphic bokeh, 35mm film grain texture. Every surface tactile — stone, iron, parchment, silk, fur, moss, wet rock, candlewax.
